Rulings.Base:
1. If you Normal Summon "Genex Neutron", but its destroyed and sent to the GY then Special Summoned back from the GY in the same turn, you cannot activate the effect to add a Tuner to your hand.
2. If "Genex Neutron" is Normal Summoned, then flipped face-down and face-up again during the same turn, you can activate its effect.
3. The player who controls "Genex Neutron" during the End Phase of the turn it was Normal Summoned can activate its effect.
4. [FORUM] "Genex Neutron" must be face-up on the field during the End Phase for its effect to activate.
